content.text:
# Persian Empire (disambiguation)

Persian Empire typically refers to the Achaemenid Empire, which existed between 550 BC and 330 BC.
Persian Empire may also refer to:
* Parthian Empire (247 BC – AD 224)
* Sasanian Empire (AD 224–651)
See also
* List of monarchs of Iran
* History of Iran
** Monarchism in Iran
* List of Persia-related topics
** Persia (disambiguation)
** Persian (disambiguation)
